What is Thoughts and Stuff?

Thoughts and Stuff is a place for me to get my thoughts about Apple and tech in general out of my head. Occasionally, I might write about travel, education, or football1, too.

Who writes all this stuff?

This website is written and run by Karan Varindani. You can sometimes find me on Medium at 301, and you can find some of my older work at Shining Paradigm. I‚Äôm constantly looking for ways to make the site better, so you‚Äôll often find me tweaking the code and other things you probably won‚Äôt notice. Feel free to get in touch.

Tell me more about the site

Thoughts and Stuff is a static Jekyll site hosted on a Linode server2. The theme is a modified version of the default Minima theme, and somewhat mimics that of Shining Paradigm. All posts are written in Ulysses (Mac, iOS). The site‚Äôs colors and logo3 were provided by my friend, John Branagan. Consider him for your graphic design needs.

Of course.
